system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

As a Computer Numerically Controlled Tool Programmers with Bachelor's Degree, your work involves develop programs to control machining or processing of materials by automatic machine tools, equipment, or systems. may also set up, operate, or maintain equipment.
